```{r cars}
# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
# load data
data = read_rds("cstates_uerates_crates_combined.rds")

filtered_data <- filter(data, NAME ==  "Illinois" | NAME == "California" | NAME == "Idaho" | NAME == "Indiana")

unemployment_plot = ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x=Year, y = Unemplyrate, color = NAME)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()

unemployment_plot
```
